items.name: Warri Grand Cinema & Entertainment Hub
items.short_description: Warri's premier state-of-the-art cinema complex featuring multiple screens, an arcade, and diverse food courts, perfect for family outings and movie lovers.
items.address: Effurun-Sapele Rd, By Airport Junction, Warri, Delta State.

items.name: Delta Innovation & Tech Hub
items.short_description: A vibrant co-working and event space fostering technological growth and entrepreneurship in Warri, offering workshops, networking opportunities, and incubation programs for young innovators.
items.address: PTI Rd, Effurun, Warri, Delta State.

items.name: Oil City Food Market & Bistro
items.short_description: A culinary destination offering a diverse array of local and international dishes, fresh produce, and gourmet treats within a chic, vibrant market setting.

items.name: Warri Waterfront Promenade
items.short_description: Enjoy scenic views of the Warri River on this beautifully developed promenade, perfect for evening strolls, jogging, and relaxation with family and friends.
items.address: Along Warri River, Near Miller Waterside, Warri, Delta State.

items.name: Delta Jungle Mini-Golf
items.short_description: Putt your way through a fun, jungle-themed 18-hole mini-golf course, an exciting challenge for all ages and perfect for family fun or a friendly competition.
items.address: Airport Rd, Off Jakpa Rd, Warri, Delta State.

items.name: Art & Culture Hub Warri
items.short_description: A dynamic space showcasing the vibrant contemporary art scene of Delta State and Nigeria, hosting exhibitions, workshops, and cultural events.
items.address: Deco Rd, GRA, Warri, Delta State.

items.name: Aqua Splash Water Park
items.short_description: Beat the Warri heat at the city's newest water park featuring thrilling slides, interactive splash pads, and a relaxing lazy river, offering refreshing fun for all ages.
items.address: Along Enerhen Rd, Warri, Delta State.

items.name: The Loft Gaming Lounge
items.short_description: Dive into the ultimate gaming experience with the latest consoles, high-end PCs, and comfortable setups, perfect for competitive play or casual fun with friends.

items.name: Warri Eco-Park & Botanical Garden
items.short_description: A serene urban oasis dedicated to preserving local biodiversity, offering walking trails, picnic spots, and educational exhibits on Delta's natural heritage.

items.name: Spice Route Gastropub
items.short_description: Experience a unique blend of Nigerian and international flavors in a stylish, vibrant setting, featuring innovative dishes and a selection of local and craft beverages for a sophisticated night out.
items.address: Deco Rd, GRA Extension, Warri, Delta State.
